extension.summary: Shadow Touch - A modern, touch-optimized Kodi skin for tablets and TV devices
extension.description: Shadow Touch is a touch-first Kodi skin designed for Samsung tablets and Nvidia Shield devices. Based on EstuaryPVR+ Omega, it combines the sleek aesthetics of modern streaming apps (Netflix, Apple TV) with the technical efficiency of a lightweight skin.[CR][CR]Key Features:[CR]- Bottom navigation bar optimized for thumb reach on tablets[CR]- Vertical grid layout with generous spacing to prevent accidental taps[CR]- Long-press overlays for quick access to media info and actions[CR]- Enhanced PVR/Live TV integration with optimized touch controls[CR]- Code-first rendering with minimal image assets for maximum performance[CR]- Dark theme with modern, minimalist design[CR][CR]Target devices: Samsung S9 FE Tablet (Touch), Nvidia Shield (Remote)[CR]Resolution: Landscape 1080p (scalable)[CR][CR]Based on EstuaryPVR+ Omega by Dumyat/SplitEnz[CR]Original Estuary skin by phil65 and Team Kodi
extension.disclaimer: Shadow Touch is in active development. Some features may be incomplete.
